text:
Lunchcruit [http://www.lunchcruit.com] | San Francisco | Onsite

Lunchcruit helps companies meet great talent over a zero-commitment free lunch. Lunchcruits are fun, casual, and a great way to explore companies around you while building more organic relationships.

*We're looking for our first few employees to join our team!

Hiring for:

   -Business Development Manager

   -Front-end Developer
To apply, send a lunch request :) - http://www.lunchcruit.com/lunch/lunchcruit
